#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MAX 405
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

bool ispal(long long n){
    long long a=0,n1=n;
    while(n){
        a=a*10+n%10;
       // cout<<a<<endl;
        n/=10;
        //cout<<n<<endl;
    }
    //cout<<a<<endl;
    if(a==n1){
        return true;
    }
    else{
        return false;
    }
}

long long getno(long long n){
    long long a=0,n1=n;
    while(n){
        a=a*10+n%10;
        n/=10;}
    return a+n1;
}
int main (){
    long long n,sum;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        //cout<<getno(n)<<endl;
        sum=0;
       N: if(ispal(n)){
            cout<<sum<<" "<<n<<endl;
        }
        else{
            n=getno(n);
           // cout<<n<<endl;
            sum++;
            goto N;
        }
        
    }
    return 0;
}
